channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report X-2023091022
item.description:
Report X-2023091022

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-23T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-19
  • City: AUBURN
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was removed from the package flow due to slightly wet external carton. DescribePack: Upon inspection 4-gallon bottles of Zep driveway & concrete cleaner had leaked some of the liquid through the sides of the cap. All four bottles were wet along bottle handles and the inside of the package was stained and wet. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed inside a lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023090896
item.description:
Report X-2023090896

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-18T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-13
  • City: AUBURN
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought to QA because it was leaking orange paint. There were no hazmat labels on the exterior. DescribePack: Package contains two 1-Gallon cans of Deltron 2000 paint and two smaller cans of a paint related substance. The lid to one of the cans of paint is bent and some of its contents have leaked out. This has coated the other cans with paint, making them difficult to identify. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was removed from the package flow and brought to QA. Once identified as a hazardous material, it was immediately processed and placed in a salvage drum.

item.title: Report I-2023100002
item.description:
Report I-2023100002

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-25T00:33:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-15
  • City: PUYALLUP
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FERRELLGAS
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 1
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Bobtail drier was driving on Hwy 512 in the far left lane, there was a dump truck hauling a pump trailer in front of him. Apparently a vehicle in front of the dump truck hit its brakes, the dump truck hit its brakes and our bobtail rear ended the truck truck& its trailer. The Ferrellgas employee was injured and sought medical treatment at Concentra Urgent care where he was treated and released for cuts, bruises to both legs and knees. The bolt on the pump broke and the gas in the lines to the meter released. Our employee was able to shut off the valve to the release.
